org.xbmc.api.business

Interface IMusicManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IManager
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MusicManager

    public interface IMusicManager
extends IManager
    This is the interface between the presentation layer and the business layer. All the controller of the presentation layer gets to see is this interface.
    Author:
    Team XBMC

      • addToPlaylist

        void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Album album,
                 Context context)
        Adds an album to the current playlist. If current playlist is stopped, the album is added to playlist and the first song is selected to play. If something is playing already, the album is only queued.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        album - Album to add

      • addToPlaylist

        void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Genre genre,
                 Context context)
        Adds all songs of a genre to the current playlist. If current playlist is stopped, play is executed. Value is the first song of the added album.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        genre - Genre of songs to add

      • addToPlaylist

        void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Song song,
                 Context context)
        Adds a song to the current playlist. Even if the playlist is empty, only this song will be added.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        album - Song to add

      • addToPlaylist

        void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Album album,
                 Song song,
                 Context context)
        Adds a song to the current playlist. If the playlist is empty, the whole album will be added with this song playing, otherwise only this song is added. Attention, the response.value result is different as usual: True means the whole album was added, false means ony the song.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        album - Album to add
        song - Song to play

      • addToPlaylist

        void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Artist artist,
                 Context context)
        Adds all songs from an artist to the playlist. If current playlist is stopped, the all songs of the artist are added to playlist and the first song is selected to play. If something is playing already, the songs are only queued.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        artist -

      • addToPlaylist

        void addToPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                 Artist artist,
                 Genre genre,
                 Context context)
        Adds all songs of a genre from an artist to the playlist. If nothing is playing, the first song will be played, otherwise songs are just added to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        artist -
        genre -

      • setPlaylistSong

        void setPlaylistSong(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                   int position,
                   Context context)
        Sets the media at playlist position position to be the next item to be played.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        position - Position, starting with 0.

      • removeFromPlaylist

        void removeFromPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                      int position,
                      Context context)
        Removes media from the current playlist. It is not possible to remove the media if it is currently being played.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        position - Position to remove, starting with 0.

      • removeFromPlaylist

        void removeFromPlaylist(DataResponse<java.lang.Boolean> response,
                      java.lang.String path,
                      Context context)
        Removes media from the current playlist. It is not possible to remove the media if it is currently being played.
        Parameters:
        position - Complete path (including filename) of the media to be removed.

        Album album,
        Song song,
        Context context)
        Plays a song, but the whole album is added to the playlist.
        Parameters:
        response - Response object
        album - Album to queue
        song - Song to play

      • getPlaylistPosition

                       Context context)

        Parameters:
        response - Response object
